CIO

Does your company have a Chief Information Officer (CIO)?

A CIO plays a critical role in aligning IT strategy with business objectives, ensuring that technology supports and enhances your company’s goals.

Why is having a CIO important?

A CIO provides leadership in digital transformation, cybersecurity, and IT infrastructure, helping businesses stay competitive in an ever-evolving technological landscape.

What if my company doesn’t have a CIO?

Without a CIO, businesses often struggle with IT decision-making, security risks, and inefficient technology investments.

While roles like CEO, CFO, and COO are common in many organizations, the CIO position is equally vital. In large corporations, a CIO is a full-time senior administrator with a technology background. However, for small and medium-sized businesses, a full-time CIO might not be necessary. This is where S&R Technology Group steps in.

Just as many small and medium-sized companies retain attorneys and CPAs for ongoing, as-needed professional services, S&R Technology Group offers on-demand CIO services tailored to your business needs.

About S&R Technology Group

Led by President Bo Reahard, S&R Technology Group assists businesses in leveraging computer technology to achieve their objectives. Mr. Reahard emphasizes, "We design and develop a single website that addresses not only the Internet needs of the organization but also their Extranet and Intranet requirements." This integrated approach allows a common database of information to be shared across all corporate audiences, with proprietary information safeguarded through a comprehensive directory services strategy.

What we can do for you

From our initial consultation, we prioritize your needs. We listen attentively and develop a plan to provide the technological presence you deserve. Our services encompass data structures, data transformation, site design, programming, hosting, and more. Based in Tampa, Florida, S&R Technology Group proudly serves clients nationwide.

Founder Bo Reahard observes, "Too many people launch a website because someone told them it would help their business. They use a generic program or get some free advice from a friend's acquaintance and then wonder why their website doesn't serve the needs of their business."

Reflecting on the dot-com challenges of the '90s, he adds, "You have to ask yourself how you can avoid those pitfalls and still harness the power of the internet to work for you. That's where we come in. At S&R Technology Group, we show small business owners how to be smarter in their use of technology, maximizing web investment dollars so that your site does everything you want it to do and more. No more 1-5 page static sites that give information but nothing else. No more 'under construction' sites that never seem to get finished. When you launch your site with us, you can be assured that it will portray the presence you want for your company and meet your customers' and clients' needs."

With over 35 years of experience in the computer industry, Mr. Reahard has assisted hundreds of clients in web-enabling their businesses, streamlining order processes, and reducing both costs and processing times.

Our Approach

From our initial consultation, we prioritize your needs. We listen to your objectives and develop a plan to maximize your technology investments. Our services encompass data structures, data transformation, site design, programming, hosting, and more. Based in Tampa, Florida, S&R Technology Group serves clients nationwide.

Why Choose Us?

Many businesses launch websites without a strategic plan, often leading to subpar results. At S&R Technology Group, we guide small business owners to use technology intelligently, ensuring your website meets your business goals and client needs. No more static pages or perpetually "under construction" sites. With us, your site will effectively represent your company and serve your customers.

About Bo Reahard

With over 35 years of experience in the computer industry, President and founder Bo Reahard has assisted hundreds of clients in web-enabling their businesses, streamlining order processes, and reducing both costs and processing times.

  • Specialist in digital transformation and business process optimization.
  • Has helped hundreds of clients integrate web solutions to improve efficiency and reduce costs.
